game.name: Spooltape
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: While filming a documentary on analog horror, something goes horribly wrong. A cursed VHS tape. Lost cultists. Salvation. Are you brave enough to follow the tape’s sinister commands? Face analog nightmares and decide your fate in this horror visual novel with multiple endings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: While filming a documentary on analog horror, something goes horribly wrong. A cursed VHS tape. Lost cultists. Salvation. Are you brave enough to follow the tape’s sinister commands? Face analog nightmares and decide your fate in this horror visual novel with multiple endings.
